mapper.select: SELECT ai.issue_id, ai.priority_code, ais.category_code from agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr, agile_issue ai, agile_issue_status ais where aisr.project_id = #{projectId} and aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} and aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id and ai.type_code in ('story','task','bug','sub_task') and ai.status_id = ais.id
